original_text: and when your herds and flocks multiply and your silver and gold is multiplied and all that you have is multiplied,
korean_text: 또 네 소와 양이 번성하며 네 은금이 증식되며 네 소유가 다 풍부하게 될 때에

sentences.original_text: and when your herds and flocks multiply
and your silver and gold is multiplied
and all that you have is multiplied,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 가진 모든 것이 번성할 때에
